title: Please do something about the bot players in bot games
body:
First they were in dominion, then they moved to the twisted treeline. Now they are here, in coop vs ai. Those are bots programmed to rush lvl 30 so they can sell them [somewhere](https://www.g2g.com/league-of-legends/account-22666-22667)
Seriously, this is getting horrible. Whenever you play against bots (AI) you usually get up to 4 bots in your team. YOUR team. 
I mean, not a lot of players play against AI, but some people just use it to rush missions o for the first victory of the day (I think Its correct to use the mode if you don't have time to play a full 30 min match) but... Please riot do something, It's not fun at all to play with for bots that die almost instantly and do literally nothing...

If you want to know if a player is a bot... Just look for the ghost + heal. They are ALWAYS bots. And I'm really getting tired...

aaanad another f** game with 4 bots riot im moving to dota i swear

replies.body:
just to let you know, Riot bans bots in waves. It makes it harder for the bot developers to know what got them caught. 

Either ban them early and make it hell to catch up with the botters but gives users a temporarily better experience, or ban them in waves while the user suffers a bit and makes it hell for the developers instead.

too bad that does absolutely nothing. 

1. account alrdy sold. so botters dont give a fuck what happens next as soon as the acc is sold, the botter doesnt care if its banned 1 year later or 1 second later.
2. acc alrdy lv 30. ruined several 100's of games
3. if the buyer has any brain, they will buy the acc right after a banwave so they have 3-4 months of abusing their acc freely. 

at this point NOT banning bots would be smarter. if you dont ban the acc, noone has to buy a new one.

^ QFT

I don't know if they were rampant in Twisted Treeline at all, but now these account providers have so many accounts they guarantee as many accounts as you need if they were banned for being born from bots.
You know who else takes ghost heal? New players... people who dont understand the game...
